translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「魔人ケイブリスの居場所は不明。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "The whereabouts of the demon lord Caveblis are unknown.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 徹底的に隠れ続けようとしている模様です」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It seems he is trying to hide thoroughly."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……だろうな。あいつの性格からして、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...That figures. Judging by his personality,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 負けた以上、誰にも見つからないように
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: since he lost, he would definitely conceal himself from everyone,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どこかに引き籠もるはずだ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and hole himself up somewhere."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「少数の救出部隊を組織する方向も検討しましたが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "We also considered organizing a small rescue team,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物界でそれは極めて難しい、という結論です。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but the conclusion was that doing so in the demon world is extremely difficult.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: タイムリミット付きでは、尚更」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Especially with a time limit."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「となると……魔物界を制圧し、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "In that case... we must take control of the demon world,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ケイブリスの居場所を見つけなければなりません。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and find Caveblis's location.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔王が覚醒するより、早く」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Before the demon lord awakens."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 一同が、押し黙る。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Everyone fell silent.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 勝ち戦かと思ったが、その実……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I thought it was a winning battle, but actually...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 王手を掛ける権利を、辛うじて握っただけだった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: we had only barely gained the right to put them in check.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「しかし……確かに、お伽噺で聞いちゃあいるが。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "However... true, we only heard of it in fairy tales.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ぶっちゃけた話、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: To be frank,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔王ってのは、本当にそんなにやばいのか？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: are demon lords really that dangerous?"
"Hmm?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「魔人なら散々戦った。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I've fought countless demons.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 無敵結界だって、ランスの魔剣で斬れる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Even an invincible barrier can be cut with Rance's magical sword.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なら、総出で掛かれば、多少は……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: So if we all attack together, maybe we could...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「不可能です」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "That's impossible."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「魔王様と戦う気があるなら今すぐ捨てろ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "If you intend to fight the demon lord, abandon that thought immediately.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 話にならん」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's nonsense."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「過去のデータを参照するに……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Referring to past data...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔王ナイチサ、ジル、ガイ、どの魔王であっても
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: whether it's the demon lords Naichisa, Jil, or Gai,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 一人で地上の生命体を全て消滅できるね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: any one of them could alone annihilate all lifeforms on the surface."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「剣が上手い、力が強い、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "They're not just skilled with swords or physically strong,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そういう次元の生命体じゃないよ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: they exist on a completely different level.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今のケイブリスだって比較にならない」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Even the current Caveblis can't compare."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 『無理よ。絶対無理』
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ‘Impossible. Absolutely impossible.’

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「んーまー、ちょっときついだろうなあ……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Well, yeah, it's probably pretty tough...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦う気のある魔王相手じゃあ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: against a demon lord who's willing to fight..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「まぁ……な。そうでなくとも、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Well... even so,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 我らにとり、魔王とはかしずく相手」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: for us, the demon lord is someone to be served respectfully.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「必要がないなら、戦うべきじゃないわ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "If there's no need, you shouldn't fight.
...Absolutely not."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そう、ですね……それは、無謀と言うほかは……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "That's right... that would be nothing but reckless..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ぶるぶるぶる！　却下却下却下！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Brrr! Rejected, rejected, rejected!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 何考えてんのゴリラ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What are you thinking, gorilla!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ジルの姐御もハンパ無かったな……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Jil's boss lady was no joke either...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: やり口はまどろっこしかったがよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Her methods were a bit roundabout, though."
"...I agree."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あん？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Huh?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「俺はぶちのめしたことあるがな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I've beaten one up before.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お前はやめとけ、がはははは」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You better not try it, hahaha!"
"...Huh? What did you just say...?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いつものホラじゃろ。本気にする気にもならん」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "That's your usual nonsense. I don't even feel like taking it seriously."

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Well... even so,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 我らにとり、魔王とはかしずく相手」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: for us, the demon lord is someone to be served respectfully.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「必要がないなら、戦うべきじゃないわ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "If there's no need, you shouldn't fight.
...Absolutely not."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そう、ですね……それは、無謀と言うほかは……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "That's right... that would be nothing but reckless..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ぶるぶるぶる！　却下却下却下！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Brrr! Rejected, rejected, rejected!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 何考えてんのゴリラ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What are you thinking, gorilla!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ジルの姐御もハンパ無かったな……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Jil's boss lady was no joke either...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: やり口はまどろっこしかったがよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Her methods were a bit roundabout, though."
"...I agree."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あん？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Huh?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「俺はぶちのめしたことあるがな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I've beaten one up before.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お前はやめとけ、がはははは」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You better not try it, hahaha!"
"...Huh? What did you just say...?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いつものホラじゃろ。本気にする気にもならん」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "That's your usual nonsense. I don't even feel like taking it seriously."
